description: Try our easy to follow Turkey & Lentil Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Turkey
name: Turkey & Lentil Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g can lentils no added salt, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mince, lentils, onion, sauces, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Divide mixture into 4 and shape into patties.
Heat oil in a frying pan over mediumlow heat. Cook the patties for 4 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through.
Arrange lettuce, beetroot slices and tomato slices onto bread roll bases. Top with patty and sweet chilli sauce. Place bread roll top over filling and serve immediately.
